AwsCoopsCreate.title: Create AWS account linkage
AwsCoopsCreate.guideline_awscoops_create_step1: Click "Create IAM Role" and log in to your AWS account. The CloudFormation screen appears.
AwsCoopsCreate.guideline_awscoops_create_step2: Automatically entered in CloudFormation "ExternalId" When "insightwatchAccountId" Are in agreement. Please confirm that.
AwsCoopsCreate.guideline_awscoops_create_step3: Check CloudFormation with IAM Resource Creation Approval checked. It takes about several minutes.
AwsCoopsCreate.guideline_awscoops_create_step4: Make sure the status of CloudFormation is "CREATE_COMPLETE" . (If it is not CREATE_COMPLETE, it will be reloaded.) Please check and input AccountID, IAMRoleName from output.
